name: Neon City Runner Demo
description:
SPACE BAR 2 JUMP (OR DOUBLE JUMP)

ENTER 2 RESTART (WAIT 1 SEC)

AVOID RED BLOCKS OR SMASH THEM WITH THE ENTER KEY (YOU GET POINTS!)

ON A PHONE? TOUCH THE LOWER LEFT CORNER 2 JUMP

TAP ANYWHERE TO RESTART

SMASH WITH LOWER RIGHT CORNER

MOST OF ALL - THANK U FOR PLAYING! <3

This is a prototype of a simple endless runner that I was working on last year, using Clickteam Fusion as the engine. This build is missing the new original placeholder art so I might come back and fix it at some point, but enjoy the Sonic placeholder in the meantime.
